> I believe there should be a limit about how much
> time a faerie can 
> keep your character frozen without having a chance
> to escape the 
> situation.  

Um, except for the bug (I'm assuming it's a bug, at
least) which causes a faerie to be able to stun a
high-level character infinitely with a single hit, it
seems as if I can always get out of a faerie stunning
me.

> Also, faeries do need another attack.  I
> would suggest 
> giving high experience level faeries the ability to
> carry teammates 
> short distances over water and forested areas.

Would be a nice ability if one was playing
cooperatively - or a nice way of throwing AI troops
into the line of fire so you aren't getting shot quite
so often.
